verses.name: 2 Samuel 12:17
verses.text: And the elders of his house arose, and went to him, to raise him up from the earth: but he would not, neither did he eat bread with them.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 12:18
verses.text: And it came to pass on the seventh day, that the child died. And the servants of David feared to tell him that the child was dead: for they said, Behold, while the child was yet alive, we spake unto him, and he would not hearken unto our voice: how will he then vex himself, if we tell him that the child is dead?
